title: Sampler, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: cross stitch on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 14 x 10 cm (5 1/2 x 3 15/16 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Two verses, one entitled "Friend Farewell," and the initials "P.G."  Worked in cross stitch.
